findings.title: Large Transaction Authorisation Feature (LTAF) and RAMS do not work properly for balance with a small value
findings.description: The validation require statements for LTAF and RAMS in the function _transfer do not properly handle the value of user balances. If a balance holds a value smaller than 0.5 * 10**18, the result of amount / 10**18 equals to 0. This leads to a bypass against the LTAF and RAMS restrictions.

findings.title: Timestamps do not match with terms in Regressive Anti-Manipulating Strategy (RAMS)
findings.description: The timestamp in the codebase does not match what is stated in the RAMS.
